Header: Attorney General’s opinion on Ranjan’s statement is submitted to Courts
Content: Ranjan Ramanayake is accused of contempt of Court following a statement he had made to the media on the 21st of August last year. The two related petitions were taken up in the Supreme Court today. Ranjan Ramanayake through his Counsel had made written submissions as to why the Court was not carrying forward the related petitions. The two petitions are due to be taken up on the 18th of this month.
